subject: Television
Olympic Games (2014)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Going live was an inevitable decision the day Comcast, NBC’s new owner, successfully bid $4.38 billion to acquire the rights to each Olympic Games from 2014 to 2020.
snippet: Going live was an inevitable decision the day Comcast, NBC’s new owner, successfully bid $4.38 billion to acquire the rights to each Olympic Games from 2014 to 2020.
